Are you sure you want to stop streaming?: 您是否確定要停止直播？
Invalid Path or Connection URL. Please: 無效路徑或是網址。請再度確認你的設定。
Failed to connect to the streaming serve: 連接串流伺服器失敗。請確認你的網路連接是否正常。
和串流伺服器斷線。請確認你的網路連接是否正常。
Could not access the specified channel o: Could not access the specified channel or stream key. Please log out and back in to refresh your credentials. If the problem persists, there may be a problem connecting to the server.
There is not sufficient disk space to co: 您沒有足夠的磁碟空間來繼續錄製影片。
The output format is either unsupported: 影片輸出格式不支援或是不支援多聲道輸出。
Please check your settings and try again: 請檢查您的設定並重試。
Title: 標題
Do not show this message when going live: 直播時不再顯示此訊息

If this error persists, you can try logg: 如果錯誤仍然存在，您可以嘗試登出並重新登入。
Use optimized encoder settings: 使用最佳化的編碼設定
Optimized encoder gives equivalent quali: 最佳化的編碼器提供相同的品質但較少的資源使用率。遊戲特定的編碼器為要塞英雄（Fornite）、絕地求生（PUBG）、天命二（Destiny 2 ）和英雄聯盟（League of Legends）進行最佳化。
Something went wrong while updating your: 更新直播資訊時發生錯誤。請重新嘗試。
更新串流資訊時發生錯誤。請重新嘗試，或者你可以
Optimized profile for average CPUs: 一般CPU進行最佳化的設定檔

YouTube account not enabled for live str: Youtube 帳號未開啟實況串流功能
Go to Youtube to view your live stream: 前往Youtube觀看自己的實況串流
Edit your stream title and description: 編輯你的實況標題以及頻道描述
Are you sure you want to exit while live: 您是否確定要在直播時離開？
Disable the preview stream, can help wit: 關閉預視實況串流，可以有效降低CPU使用率。
在設定→輸出中設置路徑
Your stream has been scheduled for %{tim: 您的直播時間現在已設定在%{time}。若您想更改或新增其他時段，請輸入其他的時間。
You can now edit your channel tags from: 您現在可以由這個畫面更改您的頻道標籤
Log out and back in to reauthorize addit: 請登出再登入來獲取新的授權
Are you sure you want to start streaming: 您是否確定要開始直播？
Please enable account for streaming to r: 請開啟帳號直播設定獲取串流金鑰
You must create a Facebook gaming page t: You must create a Facebook gaming page to go live.
You will not be asked again to update yo: 您將不會在下次直播時被再次要求更新你的串流資訊。
Use optimized encoder settings: 使用最佳化的編碼設定
You are 10 minutes away from the 8 hour: 十分鐘後您會超過八小時的直播限制
Stream has disconnected, attempting to r: 實況已斷線, 嘗試重新連接中
Twitch requires two factor authenticatio: 您的圖奇帳號需要開啟雙重認證才可以直播至圖奇。請開啟雙重認證後再嘗試。
It looks like you haven't added any vide: It looks like you haven't added any video sources yet, so you will only be outputting a black screen.
Are you sure you want to do this?: Are you sure you want to do this?
You can add sources by clicking the + ic: You can add sources by clicking the + icon near the Sources box at any time
Tweet to let your followers know you're: Tweet to let your followers know you're going live
Optimized encoding provides better quali: Optimized encoding provides better quality and/or lower cpu/gpu usage. Depending on the game, resolution may be changed for a better quality of experience
An error occurred with the output. This: An error occurred with the output. This is usually caused by out of date video drivers. Please ensure your Nvidia or AMD drivers are up to date and try again.
Something went wrong while going live, p: Something went wrong while going live, please try again.
Please schedule no further than 7 days i: Please schedule no further than 7 days in advance and no sooner than 10 minutes in advance.
Multistream allows you to stream to mult: Multistream allows you to stream to multiple platforms simultaneously.
Your Twitch login is expired. Please log: Your Twitch login is expired. Please log in again to continue using Streamlabs OBS
